trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class is a base class for deriving your own data source designer for a custom data source control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> classe é uma classe base para derivar seu próprio designer da fonte de dados para um controle de fonte de dados personalizado derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: Other classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> are <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Outras classes que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> são <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the action list collection for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de listas de ação do designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> items for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> objeto que contém o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> itens para o designer de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> pode ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Configure** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.
trans-unit.target: Um design de host, tais como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], usa essa propriedade para determinar se deve mostrar um **configurar** comando no menu de marca inteligente no modo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> pode ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Refresh Schema** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.
trans-unit.target: Um design de host, tais como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], usa essa propriedade para determinar se deve mostrar um **atualizar esquema** comando no menu de marca inteligente no modo de design.

trans-unit.source: Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o assistente de configuração para a fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O método <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> não é compatível com a classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any property of the associated data source changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma propriedade da fonte de dados associada é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação HTML usada para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação HTML usada para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The unique path to the block of data to use in creating the view.
trans-unit.target: O caminho exclusivo para o bloco de dados a ser usado ao criar a exibição.

trans-unit.source: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exibição de fonte de dados nomeada associada ao controle de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object provided by the calling object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> fornecido pelo objeto de chamada.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> event when the properties of the data source have changed and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> property value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> quando as propriedades da fonte de dados foram alteradas e o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method notifies the designer of each control bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método notifica o designer de cada controle associado à fonte de dados associado ao atualizar seu controle no host de design.

trans-unit.source: This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser suprimido com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> método, ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método com um argumento de `false`.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> event when the schema of the data source has changed and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> property value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> quando o esquema da fonte de dados foi alterado e o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the designers of each control bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed.
trans-unit.target: Este método notifica os designers de cada controle associado à fonte de dados associados os campos no esquema foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: This method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser suprimido com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> método, ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método com um argumento de `true`.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro não é usado nesta implementação.

trans-unit.source: However, it should be supported in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, devem ser compatível com classes derivadas.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema of the data.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o esquema dos dados.

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported in this class, but is implemented in derived classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não tem suporte nessa classe, mas é implementado em classes derivadas, como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Restores data source events after they have been suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Restaura os eventos de fonte de dados depois que eles foram suprimidos.

trans-unit.source: Data source events can be suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property to `false`, or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de fonte de dados podem ser suprimidos definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> propriedade `false`, ou chamando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> método com um argumento de `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents" /> é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the schema has been refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que o esquema foi atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Postpones all data source events until after the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Adia todos os eventos de fonte de dados até depois que o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents" /> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether data source events have been disabled.
trans-unit.target: Indica se os eventos de fonte de dados foram desabilitados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> event has been disabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> eventos foram desabilitadas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
